DOC.detailed_description: The aim study investigate beneficial effect bone cement combination wire cerclage stability sternum follow median sternotomy . It show previously wire cerclage alone provide stabile osteosynthesis follow median sternotomy . The hypothesis stabile osteosynthesis achieve patient recovery hasten patient discomfort pain reduce . One half patient receive wire cerclage bone cement wire cerclage . The stability sternum evaluate use radiostereometric analysis , PET-CT patient report outcomes form SF-36 VAS .
